item.title: Wuthering Waves: Havoc Rover Team Composition Guide
item.description:
Players will unlock an alternate form of Rover, called Havoc Rover, during the course of the main story of Wuthering Waves . Havoc Rover shares a lot of similarities with Spectro Rover, but the changes in their kit allow them to take on more of a main DPS role.

Havoc Rover's Forte Circuit allows them to enter a buffed berserk state called Dark Surge. During the Dark Surge state, Havoc Rover's attacks do more damage, and their basic attack combo is replaced by an alternative variant that deals more AoE. The great thing about Rover is their base stats are surprisingly high, meaning even if their kit seems lackluster on paper, the damage numbers are through the roof. Here is how to build a team around them.

1 Havoc Rover + Danjin + Jianxin

Havoc Rover is the main DPS on this team, while both Danjin and Jianxin provide support, mainly through their respective Outro Skills. Danjin's Outro skill provides a 23% Havoc DMG Deepen to the next character that switches on the field. Jianxin's Outro, on the other hand, provides a 38% Liberation DMG bonus to the next character after her. These two effects cannot be stacked. You cannot trigger Danjin's Outro and then immediately trigger Jianxin's Outro to give Havoc Rover both buffs. Each buff is only given to the one character that switches into it first. This means that players need to be very aware of which buff their Rover currently has.

If they have the Danjin buff, they want to use their basic and heavy attacks combo and trigger their Forte Circuit to enter the Dark Surge state. But if they want to do their Liberation, Jianxin's buff will technically result in more damage. Of course, Danjin's Havoc DMG Deepen also affects Rover's Liberation, but the difference will be between +22% and +38%. Note, however, that min-maxing is not required to play this team. Jianxin also serves as an excellent sub-DPS and support unit. Her value extends beyond just her Outro skill.

Havoc Rover Team Roles

  • Havoc Rover : DPS
  • Danjin : Sub-DPS
  • Jianxin : Healer, Buffer, Shielder, Crowd Control

2 Havoc Rover + Mortefi + Verina

Mortefi is one of the best support characters in Wuthering Waves who can work with almost any unit owing to the way his Liberation works. Havoc Rover is no exception. Best suited in the role of the sub-DPS, Mortefi's goal in a fight is to gather enough ER to trigger his Liberation. Once used, Mortefi summons a turret next to the active on-field unit. This can be Mortefi himself or any other unit, and the turrent doesn't fade when switching multiple times.

Any time the on-field character uses a basic attack, the turret fires one Marcato. If the character uses a heavy attack, it fires 2 Marcato. Additionally, Mortefi's Outro skill buffs the Heavy Attack damage of the incoming character by +38%. This means that characters that use exclusively heavy attacks like Jiyan are Mortefi's best pairings, but he works for other units as well. Luckily, Havoc Rover tends to use their Heavy Attack during their combo in the Dark Surge state.

Verina's buff works similarly to Mortefi's, allowing her to attack from off-field when another unit attacks a target marked by her Liberation. This means that players can stack both Mortefi’s and Verina's Liberation before switching to Havoc Rover to deal massive damage.

Havoc Rover Team Roles

  • Havoc Rover : DPS
  • Mortefi : Sub-DPS
  • Verina : Healer, Buffer

3 Havoc Rover + Sanhua + Baizhi

For F2P players, Sanhua is a free Glacio DMG unit in Wuthering Waves who can be obtained by logging in for 5 days straight. While Sanhua primarily works as a sub-DPS, she wants to have a little more time on-field in this team. Sanhua's Outro Skill buffs the incoming characters' basic attack DMG by 38%. Havoc Rover can take advantage of this by weaving and spamming basic attacks during their combo.

In an optimal rotation, Rover uses the time they have on-field with Sanhua's buff to generate as much of their Forte Circuit as possible before switching to Sanhua who will then complete a full combo (Skill, Liberation, Forte Circuit) before switching back to Rover once her Concerto is full, repeating the cycle. Baizhi's main responsibility is to heal and use her Outro skill if she needs to be switched so that the next character gains a +15% All Damage Type Deepen.

Havoc Rover Team Roles

  • Havoc Rover : DPS
  • Sanhua : Sub-DPS
  • Biazhi : Healer, Buffer

item.title: Pokemon GO: How To Get Klefki (Can Klefki Be Shiny)
item.description:
Pokemon GO trainers have multiple ways of encountering Klefki in the game. The monster is a region-specific spawn and is typically only found in France. However, during featured events like the GO Fest 2024, it also spawns in different locations.

Klefki is a dual Steel and Fairy-type Pokemon with a maximum Pokemon GO CP of 2204. The monster’s stat spread comprises 160 ATK, 179 DEF, and 149 STA, with a versatile move pool. Its best moveset combines Tackle (Normal) and Play Rough (Fairy), which results in 10.46 DPS. While there are different methods to get a Klefki, many are also wondering if Shiny Klefki is available to encounter. That said, this guide details the best way to get Klefki and Shiny Klefki availability.

How To Get Klefki In Pokemon GO (Can Klefki Be Shiny)

Klefki comes as a wild spawn , a Research task encounter , and an Egg hatch in Pokemon GO . Featured events increase the Klefki spawn rate and make it easier for you to encounter one. While Klefki is available for encounters, Shiny Klefki has yet to debut in the game. The developers at Niantic might release Shiny Klefki in future events featuring the monster.

Pokemon GO: Get Klefki As a Wild Spawn

Klefki is a wild spawn, and you can easily encounter the monster using some strategic approaches. Events featuring Klefki boost its wild spawn rate. You can use various Pokemon GO items to increase wild Klefki spawns further.

Pokemon GO items like Lure Modules, Incense, and Weather Boosts effect can significantly increase wild Pokemon spawn rates. Klefki spawns more in snow and cloudy weather. To increase its spawn rate, find a PokeStop or Gym in such weather, use a Lure Module, activate Incense, and walk around the area. This method is especially effective during featured events.

Pokemon GO: Get Klefki As A Research Task Encounter

You can encounter a Klefki by completing particular Research tasks that feature it. Events like GO Fest 2024 come with Research tasks that reward guaranteed Klefki encounters upon completion.

Pokemon GO: Get Klefki As An Egg Hatch

Klefki can hatch as an Egg spawn in Pokemon GO . You have to hatch a 7 KM Egg, but a Klefki hatching is not guaranteed. Making use of the boosted spawn rate during featured events can increase the probability of a Klefki spawning from 7 KM Eggs.

item.title: Pokemon GO: How To Get Mienfoo (Can It Be Shiny?)
item.description:
Niantic is giving players a golden opportunity to catch Mienfoo as part of the Stadium Sights event in Pokemon GO . Considering that the Pokemon hasn't been available in the game for quite a while now, many are wondering how they can catch Mienfoo and whether its shiny version is available in the game.

The Stadium Sights event is being organized for fans all across the globe to celebrate the Pokemon GO Fest 2024: Sendai event. While the event mostly focuses on the debut of shiny Emolga, there are some other exciting featured Pokemon that players can catch in the wild. Here is how to get Mienfoo in Pokemon GO , and whether it can be shiny or not.

How To Get Mienfoo In Pokemon GO

Mienfoo is now available in the wild Pokemon GO , something that wasn't possible earlier. In fact, many players were actually surprised and were wondering that Niantic had actually forgotten about Mienfoo, considering that there was a long gap between the Pokemon being last available in the game and its return at the Stadium Sights event. That's not all, since it is a featured Pokemon for the event, it will be spawning much more frequently in the wild, so players have a golden opportunity to get the Pokemon or farm candies if they haven't already

.

As far as catching the Pokemon itself is concerned, players should rely on Incense and Lure Modules to boost the spawn rate of Pokemon around them. When it comes to Lure Modules, players need to use just the regular one, considering the fact that any of the other types do not boost Fighting-type Pokemon as such. This does mean that all Pokemon will be attracted to the module, but it is still better than simply hunting Mienfoo in the wild without any added boosts.

Can You Get Shiny Mienfoo In Pokemon GO?

No, Shiny Mienfoo is not available in Pokemon GO . While many expected that Mienfoo would be released in its shiny form as part of the Stadium Sights event, the event seems to be focusing predominantly on the shiny debut of Emolga. Interestingly, Mienfoo is the only Pokemon apart from Staravia which is being featured as part of the Stadium Sights event that doesn't have a shiny variant. It is not yet known when Mienfoo will be getting a shiny variant in Pokemon GO , but it will likely be getting its own event for its debut. That being said, considering the developers have added it into the wild, it is very likely that the shiny debut might also follow suit pretty soon.

item.title: Fallout 4: Survival Mode Tips
item.description:
Survival Mode in Fallout 4 offers an entirely different experience compared to other difficulty levels in the game. In addition, Bethesda released the existing Survival Mode in 2016 and replaced the old Survival Mode, which is now the Very Hard difficulty.

An example of the changes you will experience in Survival mode is that you can no longer perform manual or quick saves. This example is only one aspect of how Survival Mode differs, and it can be extremely tricky if you don't prepare yourself before changing to this difficulty. However, you can take steps to prepare yourself to enjoy being a true Vault Dweller and Wasteland in Fallout. Here are Survival Mode tips for Fallout 4 that you should learn before starting your journey.

Survival Mode Tips for Fallout 4

The 10 Survival Mode tips for Fallout 4 below will remove the frustration from playing on this difficulty level by helping you overcome the various game mechanics changes. In addition, you should use them in conjunction with each other to make them even more effective for your survival.

Save Often

As emphasized in the introduction to this guide, you will not be able to use the Quick Save or Save function in the menu screen as shown in the picture above. In addition, there will be a limited number of autosaves completed. However, with the abundance of sleeping bags, beds, and mattresses in the game, it's crucial to save frequently. This practice secures your progress and prevents the frustration of repeating content.

Manage Your Inventory and Carry Weight

If you opt for a low-strength build, you may find yourself frequently over-encumbered, with little space in your inventory. Running out of carry weight directly results from weight changes to items. However, you can avoid this issue by planning your trips carefully and holding what's necessary. Also, avoiding looting enemies during combat is advisable to avoid becoming over-encumbered. Use a random scrap bench to dispose of items you won't be using if possible.

Utilize Your Settlements

One of the most advantageous aspects of settlements is their ability to provide a consistent food and water supply. In addition, you can build important crafting stations like the Cooking Station, Armor Workbench, and Chem Station which you can utilize to complete these tips. To fully benefit from this, ensure you consume fully cooked meals, which provide the best recovery rates. In addition, you won't receive any food benefits if you eat a piece of food that applies if you currently have a hunger status, so eat often!

Use Drugs to Help You Survive

While taking Chems in Fallout can seem like a nuisance due to the possibility of becoming addicted to them and suffering adverse side effects. As a result, they can save your life and make gameplay easier. For example, you can use Jet to slow down time to help during battles where survivability is low, like when trying to save Kent in Fallout 4 . In addition, Med-X increases your damage and poison resistance to help increase your survivability.

Level, Explore the Commonwealth, and Recruit Companions

Instead of rushing to complete the main story quests, you should take the time to gain levels, unlock perks, and develop your build so you can handle it. You can do this by exploring the Commonwealth, completing side quests, and recruiting companions that you wouldn't have done with other difficulties. This tip will help you survive and make your playthrough more enjoyable, and you'll also get to see aspects of the game you wouldn't otherwise.

Get Asbestos Armor Lining

Asbestos Lining for your armor will provide a lot of protection from Molotov cocktails as it prevents you from being able to be set on fire. Using this lining is especially useful because you can be set on fire or cause fire damage even if you don't see animations indicating you are, which could lead to surprising deaths. You can get Asbestos by junking everyday items like cigarette cartons, teapots, chalk, and oven mitts. In addition, you can purchase it from vendors like Trashcan Carla and Penny Fitzgerald, making it easy to find early in the game.

Stock Up on Stimpaks and Repair Kits

Stimpaks are essential when playing in Survival Mode because your crippled limbs are no longer auto-heal after leaving combat. Instead, it would help if you used a Stimpak to heal them. In addition, you will need them to cure downed companions. If you don't have time, they will automatically return home to recover if you leave your current area. The same goes for repairing your weapons, armor, and mechanical-based companions.

Focus on Your Weapon Build

We have two recommendations when it comes to weapons in Survival Mode for Fallout 4 . The first recommendation is to specialize in a single weapon so you don't have to carry more than one weapon and lots of different types of ammo. The second recommendation is to carry one short-range weapon and one long-range weapon to stay flexible in combat based on the enemies you are facing. Still, both recommendations are made with the thought of limiting what you carry.

Obtain The Wasteland Survival Guide

You'll want to obtain the Wasteland Survival Guide from the Sunshine Tidings location as soon as possible. Doing so will unlock a passive that causes animals to provide more meat when killed. Doing so is especially important to keep a steady supply of food to help manage your hunger levels, which will ensure you have the benefits of eating it.

Approach Combat Carefully

The last thing you want is to charge into a building of enemies while playing Fallout 4 using Survival Mode because they will kill you very quickly. Instead, you'll want to utilize stealth mode to kill enemies without using others. All you need to do is attack while crouched and you will gain bonus damage multiplier. In addition, you'll want to utilize VATS to focus on weak points of enemies like their heads. You can activate Vats by pressing Q, L1, and X if you are playing on PC, PlayStation, or Xbox respectively. Doing so will take the challenge out of large-scale battles and allow you to focus on only a handful of enemies should they be alerted to your presence.
